title: Shape Technology
description: An IoT platform providing efficient technical support and customized solutions for dozens of clients including OneNZ, Christchurch City Council, and Mackenzie District Council. I was responsible for all design and frontend architecture, as well as parts of the backend and database services. Last year, the project passed One NZ's security compliance verification.

title: Activity Hub
description: Developed an activity hub where users can register, post, join events, and message each other. Deployed on Google Firebase with a fully integrated front and back end.

title: Magic Memory
description: This is a sample React and Firebase project that includes nearly all essential features, such as TypeScript, React, and deployment on Firebase.

title: Tyre Shop
description: Initially started as a simple frontend software while learning Angular unit testing. Later, I got inspired to develop a full-stack application with a database and optimized UI/UX.

title: Vertu Equipment
description: In 2020, provided a series of services for this company including website design, development, deployment, and database management. The website has undergone multiple iterations since the project ended.
